text: StandardSession.fireContainerEvent checks for the String class name! Why not just use an instanceof check here?
creator: rob.harrop@springsource.com

text:
This is the original reason:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?view=rev&revision=287710

Don't think that applies these days.

text: Fixed in trunk and proposed for 6.0.x
